extendedInfo.description: Nice and funny live wallpaper showing a block-calendar,you can rip off papers from the calendar until the current date and then each day one!On the calendar there are nice, funny or interesting facts and jokes.** CALENDARS INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION ** - Funny Facts** FULL version consist of ** - 4 different calendars - 9 different backgrounds - 'Cheat' option to allow ripping of after the current date - multiple other options*! Please be patient on loading the first time, it can take some time!
